thread.title: Kylie Minogue 'splits from fiance Joshua Sasse'
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue 'splits from fiance Joshua Sasse'

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: Kylie Minogue 'splits from fiance Joshua Sasse'
text:
P op star Kylie Minogue has reportedly split from her fianc√©, the British actor Joshua Sasse.
The Can't Get You Out Of My Head singer, 48, met Sasse, 29, in 2015 on the set of US series Galavant, in which he stars and she was making a guest appearance.
The pair announced their engagement in February 2016.
Kylie Minogue with her fiance British actor Joshua Sasse Credit: PAUL MILLER B ut according to The Sun, the Australian star has broken off the engagement because she suspects Sasse of cheating with another actress.
Minogue recently told The Daily Mail that she planned to take her husband-to-be's name when they married.
She said: "Kylie Sasse is a great name... Kylie Minogue has never exactly tripped off the tongue.
"I'll definitely be taking Sasse but there will be Minogue in there somewhere."
Watch | Kylie Minogue and Sia show support of same-sex marriage in Australia at music awards 01:18 E arlier on Thursday, Minogue tweeted that she had signed a new record deal with label BMG.
She wrote: "#lovers ... So happy to announce my new record label is BMG. I promise you will have my heart..."
There was no comment from representatives for either Minogue or Sasse.

Kylie Minogue in numbers
